Catering

No matter the occasion, we can create the perfect menu to suit your budget, from low-key and relaxed family celebrations to corporate events, not to mention our speciality wedding catering in the Coromandel region between Whitianga and Whangapoua.

We believe every event is as unique as the people hosting it. That's why we tailor our catering offering to fit the theme, location, season and size of your celebration. We'll work with you create the perfect menu so email us now for a quote.
